Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Oakley

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 91st/Brandon
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted : due to, street blockage near 91st/Baltimore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted 91st, Baltimore, 90th and Houston: due to, street blockage near 91st/Baltimore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
